> Put it this way: The smaller your audience is the more you have to get
the job done with what they already have

Interesting point: the smaller audience, the lesser likelihood of them 
having existing code for your service, the bigger need to use existing 
standards? Makes sence. Start with a not-so-suitable-but-standard media-type 
to get people going quick and then introduce newer and better formats.

/J�rn
